Nightlight::

"What would you recomend me for dinner?"said Nightlight while she sit 
down while she looked to Rodimus.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I figured that after the events of the last few 
hours we both could use some peaceful time. So we can just relax, 
enjoy a meal, and maybe get to know each other more.
> 
> They then walked into the Mess Hall. Rodimus lead Nightlight to a 
table that was placed near a window. Through the wondow you could see 
the sun setting over the mountains. The sky was many shades of orange 
and purple.
> 
> He pulled the chair out for her allowing her to sit.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I'll go get the food from the Galley, what would you 
like?
